required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of HA121-28 Tablets in Advanced Biliary Tract Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicentre, Open-label, Single-arm Phase II Study of HA121-28 Tablets in Advanced Biliary Tract Cancer (BTC)

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multicenter, open-label, single-arm phase II study to evaluate efficacy, safety, and pharmacokinetics characteristics of HA121-28 tablets in advanced biliary tract cancer (BTC). A total of approximately 30 subjects with advanced BTC will be enrolled. The subjects will undergo a 3 weeks-on and 1week-off treatment scheme with HA121-28 tablets 600 mg orally once daily in the 28-day cycle until disease progression or intolerable toxic reaction, whichever occurs first.

arm_group.description: HA121-28 600 mg, po, QD×21 days, every 4 weeks (28 days)

intervention.description: HA121-28 600 mg, po, QD×21 days, every 4 weeks (28 days)

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital，Sun Yat-sen University
